channel.title: Ed Grubb on Sons of God Ministries International
channel.description: Recent content in Ed Grubb on Sons of God Ministries International

item.title: The Characteristics of a True Prophet
item.dc:creator: Ed Grubb
item.description: Real vs Counterfeit and Prophet Defined A certain jewelry store sold man-made stones as though they were priceless, natural gems. This was happening for years and scores of men & women bought what they thought were precious stones. No one questioned the authenticity until someone with trained eyes pointed out they were man-made. How were people deceived? The counterfeit looked remarkably like the real. The difference was not noticeable unless you had a trained eye.
